website_summaries.verdict: A neoprene dog life jacket that offers unmatched durability.
pros: Bright coloring and reflective strips provide outstanding visibility
Has quick-release buckles and Velcro on the neck and belly of the life jacket
Comes with a cloth handle on the back of the life jacket that you can use to instantly grab your dog
cons: Offers limited range of motion for some dogs
Seams tend to rip after extended use

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend's dog because she is always going fishing with us and he'd been putting her in a human life jacket on the boat haha. It arrived way sooner then they said it would and he just loves it!!! They put a lot of thought into the design of this product. It fits Ellie great and leaves her with lots of freedom to move around the way she wants too, and she is one hyper active doggie hehe. The price for the product and product shipping were great!!! I would recommend anybody looking for a dog life jacket buy this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Ward

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of days however my lab appears to enjoy the water more than she ever has
customer_reviews.text: it took a couple of days however my lab appears to enjoy the water more than she ever has, if that is possible for a lab. She used to swim and hang on us, now she just swims and loves it. I truly gives me a great sense of comfort knowing she is safe and I don't have to constantly keep an eye on her.
customer_reviews.author: RLB

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for Bulldogs!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 large jackets for my English Bulldogs. The fit is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R

customer_reviews.title: sizing is good
customer_reviews.text: We haven't taken our 70-lb GSP out in the water yet. We have put the life jacket on several times. He is more comfortable wearing the jacket than he is wearing his Thundercoat. The size we got fits fine. I do appreciate the buckles that can tighten to ensure a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: shopping53

customer_reviews.title: Allows my dog to swim without his butt sinking like a rock
customer_reviews.text: I have had to pick my dog up out of the water and the vest stayed very secure on my dog
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ramos

customer_reviews.title: ... of our dogs perfectly and makes our pittybull much happier in the
customer_reviews.text: Fits both of our dogs perfectly and makes our pittybull much happier in the water
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Our dog is comfortable in it and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Our dog is comfortable in it and we know she's always safe in the water.
customer_reviews.author: billye chambers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket for the money. Order the next size up if you have a deep chested dog.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great ptoduct!
customer_reviews.text: Our JD loves going out in the boat and even tho he's a trained Bird dog, it makes me feel better to know he's protected in the St. Mary's river in Michigan.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Cross

customer_reviews.title: be wary of sizing
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to buy this life vest for my lab/boxer mix he's 80-90 pounds (33in around his back and chest), I bought him a large according to the sizing chart. Turns out one of the buckles wont snap, under his chest. It's a few inches two short. Had to buy an XL instead.
customer_reviews.author: coleycole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loved it and it worked perfectly!! Best investment for our doggy!
customer_reviews.author: Big Vick

product_meta.title: Paws Aboard Dog Life Jacket, Fashionable Dog Life Vest for Swimming and Boating - Neon Yellow
feature_bullets: KEEP YOUR FURRIEST MATE SAFE - Vibrant colors and reflective strips increase visibility of your playful pooch day and night. Our dog life vest is equipped with a top rescue handle for a quick and easy grab on the go

QUALITY MATERIALS - This Paws Aboard Doggy Life Jacket is made of quick-dry, breathable nylon fabrics for ultimate buoyancy. Lightweight, durable materials allow a wide range of motion for all-day comfort. Perfect for dogs and owners who love water sports!
FASHION FORWARD - Perfect for your fashionable first mate, this life jacket combines a stylish silhouette with bold awesome colors and patterns

ADVANCED, BREATHABLE MESH UNDERBELLY - Unlike traditional life jackets, which can cause chafing and heat exhaustion, the Paws Aboard advanced design features a breathable mesh underbelly that allows for proper water drainage and drying to provide your dog greater comfort and healthier conditions. Adjustable collar and the velcro secured mesh underbelly create a custom fit for all breeds and body shape

CHOOSE THE RIGHT SIZE - Measuring Body Girth is critical for getting the best fit. Do not approximate or guess! Before placing your order, please measure your dog’s Body Girth at the widest point, behind their front legs. Use our Blue Sizing Chart and pick the right size. If your pet falls between two sizes, we advise ordering the larger of the two
